title: Prince Considered for Posthumous Congressional Gold Medal
sub_head: Minnesota lawmakers introduce legislation to give musician one of nation’s highest civilian honors
body:
The congressional delegation from Minnesota hopes to honor Prince, the late music superstar, with one of the nation’s highest civilian honors.
Minnesota lawmakers, led by Sen. Amy Klobuchar and Rep. Ilhan Omar, introduced legislation Monday in the U.S. House and Senate to award Prince, born Prince Rogers Nelson, a Congressional Gold Medal.
